Bookmark: Design a bookmark that doubles as a character or scene from the book, making it more engaging for readers to use and recall the story.
Interactive Elements: Incorporate interactive elements such as QR codes or augmented reality (AR) into the book, allowing readers to access additional content, videos, or games related to the story.
Customizable Fonts: Offer different font styles and sizes for readers to personalize their reading experience, catering to various reading preferences and needs.
Book Light: Develop a book light that attaches to the book and provides a soft, adjustable glow, enhancing the reading experience and reducing eye strain.
Multi-Language Support: Include multiple language options for readers to enjoy the book in their preferred language, expanding its accessibility and reach.
